txt.en:
'Greetings, [placeholder]. There are many Hunters who seek the Path of the Trapper, but not all can accomplish their task alone. You should seek to aid your fellow Hunters along their path.

'The greatest danger your fellow will face is at the Grand Stair.

'Go now and prove your honour.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]. You are truly a worthy Hunter-friend.'
'If you should come across a hunter in need of your aid, you should grant it.'
The Path of the Trapper:  Lending a Hand
Many Hunters seek the Path of the Trapper, but not all can accomplish their goals alone.
The Grand Stair lies just north from the camp where you met Eniel.\n\nEniel has instructed you to help a fellow Hunter complete his or her final task at the Grand Stair.
Eniel is at the camp-site just south from the Grand Stair.\n\nWith the leader of the White Hand slain, you should return to Eniel.
